text: aur hamane banee isarail ko (maalik shaam mein) bahut achchhee jagah basaaya aur unhan achchhee achchhee cheezen khaane ko dee to un logon ke paas jab tak ilm (na) aa chuka un logon ne ekhtelaaf nahin kiya isamen to shaq hee nahin jin baaton mein ye (duniya mein) baaham jhagade rahe hai qayaamat ke din tumhaara paravaradigaar isamen phaisala kar dega
